reviewText: This is absolutely the best prenatal yoga DVD out there! After wasting my money on other prenatal DVD's, I finally found April's and LOVED it. I was able to do it 3x a week, even toward the end of my pregnancy and I truly feel it helped with my labor! I only pushed for 20 minutes and attribute all my flexibility & how limber I was to April's yoga! Don't waste a moment! Buy this DVD & see for yourself!
